name: Txt Advntre
description:
Txt Advntre 

You're lost and don't know how you got here or where you've been. The only item you're carrying is your trusty Nokia. Can you find your way back home?

This is a txt spk adventure for the C64 Cassette 50 Competition - all code must sit below $1000 in memory.

Apologies to anyone who has English as a second language. Or a first language...

Vocabulary:

N, S, E, W, U, D
TAKE, DROP, EXAMINE, USE, ENTER, CLIMB, GIVE

Example:

TAKE SPOGGY
EXAMINE GRAVE
